tp:treatment-sec.p:
MYANMAR • 1 ♀ ; Kachin State , Hukawng Valley , Mid-Cretaceous Burmese amber inclusion; in the collection of Patrick Müller ( BuB4098 )
.
MEASUREMENTS. 13.0 mm long, 0.4 mm in diameter, 43 +3 body rings.
AMBER DESCRIPTION. Triangular, flat, 15.0 × 10.8 × 2.3 mm . Light yellow, transparent.
TAPHONOMIC FEATURES. Anterior body rings compressed. Posterior body rings partly polished away.
